prHeadline: Inkbit Bolsters Executive Team with Addition of Industry Veteran Eric Bert
headlineTxt: Aug 10, 2021, 08:00 ETInkbit Bolsters Executive Team with Addition of Industry Veteran Eric Bertmanufacturing of multi-material, end-use products. Using computer science to improve manufacturing, Inkbit developed the first 3D printer powered by machine vision and real-time feedback control to meet the speed, precision and reliability requirements of volume production.
